segments.text: What a mess in this kitchen I'm observing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there drying dishes like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing terribly; water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring down the front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A huge puddle is forming on the slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has one foot in the water and doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so oblivious to this disaster?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at those kids causing more trouble behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on that tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar, stealing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors are wide open above him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is helping him, reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They shouldn't be doing this without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just asking for an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is calm, unlike this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
